donorportal-title: Title for page allowing donors to see and manage donations
donorportal-login-header: Large text for donor portal login page
donorportal-login-text: Explanation of how to request a login link for the donor portal
donorportal-login-email-placeholder: Placeholder prompt in email entry box on donor portal login page
donorportal-login-problems: Text of link to request help at bottom of donor portal login page
donorportal-greeting: Text greeting a donor on the donor portal. $1 is the donor's first name
donorportal-boldtext: Text atop the donor portal thanking the donor for giving
donorportal-greetingtext: Text atop the donor portal thanking the donor for giving
donorportal-contact-details: Header text for box with donor's name and contact information
donorportal-donorid: Text to show donor the id of their record in our CRM. $1 is an alphanumeric identifier
donorportal-update-preferences: Link to a page to change email & SMS preferences
donorportal-recurring-heading: Header for a list of all recurring donations both active and inactive
donorportal-active-recurring: Header for a list of active recurring donations
donorportal-inactive-recurring: Header for details of a cancelled donation
donorportal-most-recent-donation: Header for details of donor's most recent donation
donorportal-renew-support: Large text inviting donor to restart a cancelled donation
donorportal-restart-monthly: Text of button leading to a monthly donation renewal form
donorportal-restart-annual: Text of button leading to an annual donation renewal form
donorportal-recurring-amount-monthly: Amount and frequency of a donation charged every month. $1 is the formatted amount, $2 is the three letter currency code for extra clarification.
donorportal-recurring-amount-annual: Amount and frequency of a donation charged every year. $1 is the formatted amount, $2 is the three letter currency code for extra clarification.
donorportal-recurring-next-amount-and-da: Amount and date of next upcoming charge. $1 is the formatted amount, $2 is the three letter currency code for extra clarification, and $3 is the formatted date.
donorportal-last-amount-and-date: Amount and date of last donation. $1 is the formatted amount, $2 is the three letter currency code for extra clarification, and $3 is the formatted date.
donorportal-update-donation-button: Text for a button to change the amount of the donation
donorportal-new-donation: Text for a button leading a donation to a form to make a new donation
donorportal-recurring-pause: Action word for temporarily stopping a recurring donation. Will be linked and interpolated into {{msg-mw|donorportal-recurring-pause-or-cancel}}
donorportal-recurring-cancel: Action word for permanently stopping a recurring donation. Will be linked and interpolated into {{msg-mw|donorportal-recurring-pause-or-cancel}}
donorportal-recurring-pause-or-cancel: Text for a phrase with links to temporarily or permanently stop a recurring donation. $1 is a link with the text of {{msg-mw|donorportal-recurring-pause}} and $2 is a link with the text of {{msg-mw|donorportal-recurring-cancel}}
donorportal-recurring-status-active: Adjective to describe a recurring donation that is actively being charged
donorportal-recurring-status-lapsed: Adjective to describe a recurring donation that has expired or been cancelled
donorportal-recurring-status-paused: Adjective to describe a recurring donation that has been temporarily put on hold but will resume in the future
donorportal-your-donation-history: Header for a list of completed donations
donorportal-print-donations: Text for a button to present a printer-formatted list of donations
donorportal-annual-fund: Text for a tab header to show donations made to the foundation's annual fund
donorportal-endowment: Text for a tab header to show donations made to the foundation's endowment
donorportal-endowment-short: Sentence explaining what would appear on the endowment donations tab, shown to donors with no donations to the endowment
donorportal-endowment-what-is: Text of a question shown shown to donors with no donations to the endowment.
donorportal-endowment-explanation: Brief description of the Wikimedia Endowment. Answer to the question posed in donorportal-endowment-what-is, shown to donors with no donations to the endowment.
donorportal-endowment-learn-more: Text of a link donors can click to read more about the Wikimedia Endowment
donorportal-endowment-donate-now: Text of a link donors can click to make a donation to the Wikimedia Endowment
donorportal-donation-date: Header for a table column with donation dates
donorportal-donation-type: Header for a table column with donation types, e.g one-time, annual, monthly
donorportal-donation-amount: Header for a table column with donation amounts
donorportal-payment-method: Header for a table column with donation payment methods
donorportal-donation-type-annual: Inserted into {{msg-mw|donorportal-donation-type-recurring-template}} to indicate donation is part of annual series
donorportal-donation-type-monthly: Inserted into {{msg-mw|donorportal-donation-type-recurring-template}} to indicate donation is part of monthly series
donorportal-donation-type-one-time: Table cell text indicating that a donation was not recurring
donorportal-undefined-route: The message that is shown when a user is directed a route that does not exist: $1 - the email address for donor services
donorportal-pause-recurring-heading: Heading text displayed on the pause recurring screen
donorportal-pause-recurring-subheading: Subheading text displayed on the pause recurring screen
donorportal-pause-recurring-subtext:
Introductory text for the subscription details. Shown about information such as the sum, the frequency, the credit card, and last donation date.
[[File:Donor Portal Recurring Pause page.png|thumb|300px|Screenshot]]
donorportal-pause-recurring-next-donatio: Introductory text for the next donation date, $1 - date of next donation
donorportal-pause-recurring-no-recurring: Text shown when no donation has been given on an existing subscription till date
donorportal-pause-recurring-specify-dura: Explanatory text for selecting how long the donor would like to pause the subscription
donorportal-pause-recurring-changed-my-m: Button to cancel the pause recurring action
donorportal-pause-recurring-days: This is the duration in days to specify the units of time for the pause duration. For example, "30 days". $1 - number of days
donorportal-pause-recurring-confirmation: Confirmation text when recurring pause is successful
Confirmation subtext when recurring pause is successful
donorportal-pause-failure: Error message shown when attempt to pause recurring fails, $1 - Donor relations email
donorportal-loginpage-figure-title: Title of image shown on login screen. See [[:d:Q1043461|translations of Inle Lake]].
donorportal-loginpage-figure-alt: Alt text for image shown on login screen, $1 - html anchor element containing the link and title of the image
donorportal-loginpage-figure-caption: Caption for image shown on login screen, $1 - title of the image. Sopyaylynn is a username on Commons.
donorportal-header-our-work: Link title to our work page
donorportal-email-required: Error response when donor email is missing
donorportal-something-wrong: Error response for any other error class
donorportal-return-to-account-button: Label for button that navigates users to the home page
donorportal-cancel-recurring-other-ways-: Heading shown when donor attempts to cancel a recurring donation
Text shown when donor attempts to cancel a recurring donation in order to convince them to consider alternative approaches that would maintain their recurring donation.
Second paragraph of the text shown when a donor attempts to cancel a recurring donation explaining how a monthly donation helps the foundation goals.
Continuation of donorportal-cancel-recurring-other-ways-text-line2 but surrounded by html strong element for emphasis.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-pause-alter: This is the header for the pause a donation alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text for the pause a donation alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text on the button for the pause a donation alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-frequency-a: This is the header for the switch from monthly recurring to annual recurring alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text for the switch from monthly recurring to annual recurring alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text on the button for the switch from monthly recurring to annual recurring alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-amount-chan: This is the header for the change the recurring amount alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text for the change the recurring amount alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
This is the text on the button for the change the recurring amount alternative option instead of cancelling the donation.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-confirm-can: Button label to proceed with cancellation action
donorportal-cancel-recurring-quit-header: Header text for button that quits the cancellation action and returns the donor to the home page
donorportal-cancel-recurring-confirmatio: Header text that preceeds the summary of the recurring contribution to be cancelled
Text that preceeds the summary of the recurring contribution to be cancelled
donorportal-cancel-recurring-request-for: Text requesting for reasons behind cancellation request
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-dona: Cancel reason option - Donor prefers to take control of when they give and how often they give.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-pref: Cancel reason option - Donor is cancelling the current recurring in other to start another with a different payment method
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-canc: Cancel reason option - Donor is no longer interested in supporting the foundation
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-othe: Cancel reason option that allows the donor specify a reason other than the available options
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-unin: Cancel reason option - Donor did not mean to set up a recurring contribution
donorportal-cancel-recurring-cancel-butt: Button text to confirm cancellation of recurring
donorportal-cancel-recurring-changed-my-: Link text to cancel recurring cancel process
donorportal-cancel-recurring-switch-to-a: Link text to switch recurring to annual donation
donorportal-cancel-recurring-confirmatio: Header shown when a recurring donation has been successfully cancelled.
donorportal-cancel-monthly-recurring-con: Text shown when a monthly recurring donation has been successfully cancelled: $1 - full amount string, ex. '$10.00 USD monthly'
donorportal-cancel-annual-recurring-conf: Text shown when an annual recurring donation has been successfully cancelled: $1 - full amount string, ex. '$10.00 USD yearly'
donorportal-cancel-failure: Error message shown when attempt to cancel recurring fails, $1 - Donor relations email
donorportal-aside-did-you-know: Heading for donor portal widget that shows facts about Wikipedia.
donorportal-aside-fun-fact: Text for donor portal widget that shows facts about wikipedia
donorportal-aside-faq: Heading for donor portal frequently asked questions widget. Links to https://donate.wikimedia.org/wiki/FAQ
donorportal-aside-faq-giving-other-ways: FAQ link to ways to give page. Links to https://donate.wikimedia.org/wiki/Ways_to_Give
donorportal-aside-faq-giving-legacy: FAQ link about legacy giving. Links to https://donate.wikimedia.org/wiki/Legacy . "Legacy" means donating one's estate or a part of it to Wikimedia.
donorportal-aside-faq-giving-new-donatio: FAQ link about making a new donation
donorportal-aside-faq-giving-become-edit: FAQ link about becoming a Wikipedia editor
donorportal-aside-faq-how-wikipedia-work: FAQ link about how Wikipedia Works
donorportal-aside-article-of-the-day-hea: Heading for donor portal widget that shows Wikipedia articles daily
donorportal-feedback-button: Text on the feedback request button
donorportal-donations-disclaimer: Disclaimer text about donations shown at the bottom of the home page where a donor's contributions are listed. $1 - Donor email, $2 - HTML anchor text containing donor relations email address
donorportal-tax-disclaimer: Disclaimer text about tax shown at the bottom of the home page where a donor's contributions are listed. $1 - HTML anchor text containing donor relations email address
donorportal-donationtable-pagination-tex:
Pagination text shown at the bottom of the table describing the list index and count.
* $1 - start index value for the current displayed list
* $2 - end index value for the current displayed list
* $3 - total count of the items on the table
emailpreferences-dont-send-email: Label for e-mail opt-out radio button.
emailpreferences-expired-link-title: Headline for modal shown when a link has an expired checksum
emailpreferences-send-new-link: Text for button donor can click to request we send them a new link via email
emailpreferences-new-link-sent: Text informing donor we have sent a new link
emailpreferences-footer-learn_more: First paragraph of the email preferences footer. Similar to the footer on the "thank you" page (https://thankyou.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page). "Chapters" are local Wikimedia organizations; see [[:m:Wikimedia chapters]].
emailpreferences-footer-questions_email: Second paragraph of the email preferences footer. Similar to the footer on the thank you page (https://thankyou.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)
emailpreferences-footer-text_license: Third paragraph of the email preferences footer. Similar to the footer on the thank you page (https://thankyou.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)
emailpreferences-header-link-our-work: Link title to our work page
emailpreferences-header-link-support-wik: Link title to support wikipedia page
emailpreferences-save: Label for button to save e-mail preferences
emailpreferences-send-email: Label for e-mail opt-in radio button.
emailpreferences-snooze-email: Label for e-mail radio button to pause emails for a number of days. $1 is the number of days, set in config.
emailpreferences-success: Message following successful submission of preferences update.
emailpreferences-title: Title for page where the user an set preferences for WMF fundraising e-mails.
emailpreferences-confirmemail-title: Title for page where the user confirm that they want to set their primary email to the e-mail they pass.
recurupgrade: Title for page where the user can upgrade their recurring amount
recurupgrade-add: Text for buttons to add an amount. $1 is the formatted amount with currency symbol
recurupgrade-amount-ask: Header for the group of buttons asking how much to add
recurupgrade-amount: Label for the current recurring amount field
recurupgrade-ask-bigger: Text inviting user to make a bigger impact
recurupgrade-ask-heading: Further text for the recurring upgrade heading
recurupgrade-ask-thankyou: Text thanking the donor in advance
recurupgrade-current-amount-and-date: Statement of current recurring amount and next charge date. $1 is the formatted amount with currency symbol and $2 is the formatted date
recurupgrade-small-increase: Text explaining why to increase the donation
recurupgrade-next-scheduled-date: Label for the next recurring donation date
recurupgrade-salutation: Heading for the recurring upgrade. $1 is the donor's full name
recurupgrade-salutation-no-recur-records: Heading for the recurring upgrade error page
recurupgrade-no-recur-records: Text under the recurring upgrade error heading. $1 is the link to the recurring donation page and $2 is the Donor relations email address.
recurupgrade-select-option: Text under the amount options instruction the donor to select one
recurupgrade-thanks-increasing: Text following the current amount and date thanking the donor for upgrading
recurupgrade-thanks-monthly: Header for the section below the options, thanking the donor for giving monthly
recurupgrade-upgrade-decline: Choose keep the same amount for recurring upgrade request
recurupgrade-upgrade-decline-long: Longer text for the button declining to increase the donation
recurupgrade-upgrade-now: Alternate text for the recurring upgrade submit button
recurupgrade-upgrade: Label for selecting the amount by which the recurring amount is increased
recurupgrade-upgrading-new-amount: Text to show the donor how much their new monthly contribution will be. The empty <nowiki><strong></nowiki> tag will be filled with the new amount on the client side.
recurupgrade-upgrading-new-amount-and-da: Text to show the donor how much their new monthly contribution will be and when it will be charged. $1 = new amount, $2 = next charge date, added on the client side.
fundraiserunsubscribe-confirm: To confirm that the user wants to unsubscribe from getting e-mail notifications.
fundraisersubscribe: Title shown on page letting users opt in to emails.
fundraisersubscribe-appeal-headline-001: Appeal headline for opt-in page variant 001
fundraisersubscribe-appeal-text-001: Appeal text for opt-in page variant 001
